text: I think those are strong comments and point 4 makes  a lot of sense.  If you look in bugzilla you will se documentation change proposals going back to before bugzilla (sort in reverse order). Now there are lots of resources out there but none of them could be termed a point of truth, which is why this guide is so important.   But that means there needs to be a clear governance model and people have to feel good about doing work that is not easy. So focusing on that might make sense.
